returns.continuousFees_: The fees that implement the `Continuous` fee hook

invokeContinuousFeeHookAndPayoutSharesOu.details: This is just a wrapper to execute two callOnExtension() actions atomically, in sequence. The caller must pass in the fees that they want to run this logic on.

params._fees: The fees for which to run these actions

getContinuousFeesForFund(address).notice: Gets all fees that implement the `Continuous` fee hook for a fund

invokeContinuousFeeHookAndPayoutSharesOu.notice: Invokes the Continuous fee hook on all specified fees, and then attempts to payout any shares outstanding on those fees

documentation.text:
@notice Gets the `FEE_MANAGER` variable
 @return feeManager_ The `FEE_MANAGER` variable value
